dialogues: Ebenezer: I found this positive pregnancy test in a trashcan…
Ebenezer: The test can only belong to our one and only victim.
Diego: What the- That… doesn’t have anything to do with this-
Ebenezer: I am aware of our victims' relationship with your mother: they couldn’t get along these days.
Ebenezer: And it seems you… had grown quite fond of her.
Ebenezer: You knew this would shatter your own relationship with your mother, this was a huge blunder on your behalf; you had to get rid of her.
Diego: That’s not- I mean yes but- I would never- I would never commit a murder… And especially… especially on her!

Diego: I swear it wasn’t me!- Please, please, it wasn’t me! You have to believe me!- Please, my life has only just begun, my dream is finally within reach!- I don’t know who did it, I don’t know what happened- but what I do know is that I had nothing to do with it!!- I can’t… I can’t go to prison… please… I can’t… I didn’t… I didn’t do it… He must be lying.
Diego: I didn’t… I didn’t even get to say goodbye to her…
